# Load our data

```{r}
library(readr)
data <- read_rds("fort_collins_pm25_2018.rds")
```

---

# Take a look

```{r}
head(data, 3)
```

```{r, fig.width=10, fig.height=5}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
ggplot(tmp <- data %>% gather(var, val, 3:5),
       aes(x = datetime, y = val)) +
geom_point(color = "darkorchid4") +
facet_wrap(~var, ncol = 1) +
theme_bw() +
ylab(expression("PM"~"("*mu*g*m^-3*")")) +
xlab("")
```
